name: Chatterlome
damage_resistances: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chatterlome makes four chisel attacks.

actions.name: Chisel
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Box Teleport
actions.desc: The chatterlome magically teleports up to 120 feet into a box, chest, wardrobe, or other wooden container with a lid or door. The chatterlome can hide inside the container as a bonus action after teleporting. If the chatterlome uses this action while inside a container, it can teleport into another container within range or it can teleport back to the Hells. If it teleports to the Hells, it canâ€™t return to the Material Plane until it is summoned.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The chatterlome has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
